title: Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the First Lady


For Immediate Release
November 30, 2015

 



Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama





Wednesday, December 2, 2015

The White House * 1:00 PM – First Lady Michelle Obama will host a preview of the 2015 holiday decor at the White House.  After delivering remarks in the East Room, the First Lady will be joined in the State Dining Room by White House Executive Chef Cris Comerford, White House Executive Pastry Chef Susan Morrison, and White House Chief Floral Designer Roshan Ghaffarian, who will demonstrate holiday crafts and treats.

	As part of the Joining Forces initiative, the First Lady will welcome military families to the White House for the first viewing of the 2015 holiday decorations. As in years past, many of the White House holiday decorations will honor military families.
